name: Archive.today
description: Archive any webpage, including Facebook and search for archived pages.

name: Auto Archiver
description: Bellingcat's tool to automatically archive social media posts, videos, and images. Free and Open-Source.

name: Bellingcat TikTok Hashtag Analysis
description: Archive content and metadata from TikTok posts that contain one or more specified hashtags

name: Distill.io
description: Distill.io is a website change monitoring tool that allows users to track changes on web pages.

name: Hunchly
description: An archiving tool that tracks online activities and preserves essential information about the web pages researchers visit.

name: Instant Data Scraper
description: Browser extension for simple web scraping, with table output.

name: Wayback Machine
description: The Internet Archive's Wayback Machine lets users view and archive web pages, aiding in historical research and digital preservation.

name: Lumen
description: A research project collecting and publishing legal takedown notices for online content transparency

name: Web Archives
description: A browser extension to view archived and cached versions of a website on multiple archiving sites.

name: 527 Explorer
description: ProPublica's 527 Explorer is a database that allows users to examine the finances of organizations known as 527s in the United States, which can raise unlimited sums for political purposes.

name: China-related resources
description: Resources for research on companies in China.

name: Companies House
description: Search companies and individuals in the United Kingdom and Gibraltar.

name: EDGAR
description: Database of corporate filings for the US

name: EDGAR Command Line Interface (edgar-tool)
description: Tool for the retrieval of corporate and financial data from SEC's EDGAR (Electronic Data Gathering, Analysis, and Retrieval) database.

name: Etherscan
description: An explorer that allows researchers to track wallets, transactions and more on the Ethereum blockchain.

name: EU consolidated corporate registers
description: Consolidated company registers covering most of the EU, Iceland Liechtenstein and Norway.

name: Global Suppliers Online
description: A site dedicated to connect suppliers and buyers of goods from all over the world.

name: ICIJ Offshore Leaks Database
description: Find out who’s behind more than 810k offshore companies, foundations and trusts from the Panama Papers, the Offshore Leaks, the Bahamas Leaks and the Paradise Papers investigations.

name: ImportGenius
description: Commercial supplier of shipment data for 19 countries.

name: ImportYeti
description: Search 60 million US customs sea shipment records, find company suppliers.

name: LittleSis
description: Connects dots between influential / wealthy individuals in (mostly US) politics and business.

name: Lumen
description: A research project collecting and publishing legal takedown notices for online content transparency

name: North Data
description: Search for people and companies in EU corporate and trade registers + visualize relationships

name: OCCRP Aleph
description: Aleph offers a way to research sanctions lists, corporate registries, leaks, and more

name: Open Ownership
description: Links to beneficial ownership registers.

name: OpenCorporates
description: Comprehensive repository of company registries around the world

name: OpenSanctions
description: Open-source international database of sanctions data, persons of interest and politically exposed persons.

name: OpenSecrets
description: Data on campaign finance, lobbying, and spending in U.S. politics

name: Osint Tools Map
description: An interactive worldwide map, showcasing business registries, court records, and other publicly available information to aid OSINT investigations and research.

name: RuPEP
description: Online database of politically exposed persons in Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan.

name: SanctionsExplorer
description: A comprehensive database of current and historical OFAC/UN/EU sanctions

name: UN Comtrade Database
description: United Nations free database of global trade.

name: Wikipedia list of registers
description: Wikipedia list of official business registers around the world.

name: ACLED (Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project)
description: ACLED provides data and analysis on political violence and protest around the world, facilitating research, policy making, and journalistic reporting.

name: Bulletpicker.com
description: Bulletpicker.com is a collection of ammunition guidebooks and manuals from several different armed forces.

name: CAT UXO
description: A repository for professionals working in the explosive ordnance disposal (EOD) space.

name: LiveUAMap
description: LiveUAMap is a mapping tool that provides up-to-date information on global geopolitical events, conflicts, and crises.

name: Open Source Munitions Portal
description: A tool for researchers, journalists and practitioners trying to learn more about munitions and their use and impact in conflict.

name: Atlos
description: ATLOS is a platform for collaborative and large-scale open source investigations.

name: Blender
description: Blender is an open-source 3D creation suite supporting the 3D pipeline—modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing, and motion tracking, even video editing.

name: Datawrapper
description: A tool for creating interactive charts, maps, and tables from your data, offering a user-friendly interface for visualizing information.

name: Gephi
description: Open-source network analysis and visualization software

name: Logseq
description: Logseq is an open-source knowledge management tool that enables users to organize their notes, tasks, and projects.

name: Maltego Graph
description: Maltego Graph is an investigation platform that combines two things at once: (1) It acts as a search tool, and (2) It creates a graph establishing links between data you uncover from your search.

name: Obsidian
description: A knowledge management and note-taking app with extensive customization options.

name: Pinpoint
description: A tool by Google to catalogue uploaded documents and files, providing OCR, indexing, and other services. Full access only granted to journalists, academic researchers and university students.

name: QGIS
description: QGIS is a free Open Source Geographic Information System (GIS).

name: RAWGraphs
description: RAWGraphs is an open-source data visualization tool designed for non-technical users, enabling the creation of customizable, editable charts without coding skills.

name: Time.Graphics
description: A tool for creating, visualizing, and managing timelines online.

name: AllTrails
description: AllTrails.com is a tool for discovering hiking, biking, and running trails worldwide, providing detailed trail maps, user reviews, and navigation support for outdoor enthusiasts.

name: Amazonia Socio Ambiental
description: Amazon rainforest maps and shapefiles of natural protected areas, concessions, indigenous territories, oil, mining, roads, fires, deforestation in bolivia, brazil, colombia, ecuador, guyanas and suriname, peru, venezuela

name: Aquaduct Water Risk Atlas
description: Water and drought risks mapped, globally.

name: BirdNet
description: Identify bird sounds - find bird sounds on a global map.

name: CITES Trade Database
description: Around 23 million records of trade in wildlife since 1975.

name: CryO Tools
description: Scientific tools for investigating the cryosphere (areas with snow & ice)

name: Environmental Justice Atlas
description: Map of environmental-related conflict globally

name: Global Fishing Watch Map
description: The Global Fishing Watch Map is a digital platform for investigating fishing activities worldwide by utilising satellite and AIS data.

name: Global Forest Watch
description: It helps to detect changes in forest cover (i.e., to track deforestation), fires, land use, and more. It also includes Global Fire Watch (VIRSS data)

name: Global Monitoring System - ECOSOLVE
description: Illicit online wildlife markets data from Brazil, South Africa and Thailand.

name: Google Flood Hub
description: A visual tool to monitor river levels and forecast floods based on AI models developed by Google Research.

name: Merlin
description: Identify birds (visually), through an app.

name: Movebank
description: Platform for animal tracking data.

name: Resource Watch
description: A nonprofit platform, still in beta, that provides hundreds of data sets on the state of the planet’s resources and citizens. It is sponsored by the World Resources Institute and other organizations.

name: River Runner Global
description: Calculate which water stream a drop of rain will follow

name: UNOSAT Analyses
description: UNOSAT Analyses is a tool that maps humanitarian emergencies across the globe utilising United Nations Satellite Centre data.

name: WildEye
description: Tracking tool for data on environmental and wildlife crime cases, including court cases and convictions, across the globe.

name: Wildlife Trade Portal
description: An open-source tool to search wildlife seizure data worldwide.

name: WildMe & WildBook
description: Open source pattern recognition software to identify unique whales, sharks, zebras, jaguars, skunks, fish and much more.

name: World Database Protected Areas
description: The most comprehensive global database on terrestrial and marine protected areas.

name: GeoHints
description: GeoHints is a website that provides information about things like traffic lights, utility poles, bollards etc. for different regions of the world to help geolocate a location.

name: Geolocation Estimation
description: A geolocation tool using a deep-learning model to predict the location of an image.

name: GeoNames
description: The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eleven million place names that are available for download free of charge Extremely useful in Geo Tagging, documentation, and data collection.

name: License Plate Maps
description: Collection of tools and maps for discerning license plates by country

name: MW Geofind
description: MW Geofind is a tool designed to help users identify the filming location of YouTube videos, facilitating the exploration of global content from a geographical perspective.

name: Bellingcat OpenStreetMap Search
description: A user interface to search OpenStreetMap data for features in proximity to each other.

name: Photo-Map.RU
description: Geotagged VK posts.

name: ShadeMap
description: ShadeMap is a global simulation of mountain, building & tree shadows for a given date & time. Base data is free, but users can buy 30cm accurate data per sq km for areas of special focus.

name: Shadow Finder
description: To analyse shadows in source imagery, Shadow Finder maps all points on the earth where a shadow of given length could occur at a given date & time, IF the height of the object casting it is known.

name: ShadowMap
description: Global map of 3D buildlings and the shadows they cast at a specific time a day

name: SunCalc
description: Suncalc models the relationship between the date, time of day, the geographic location of a place, and the position of the sun in the sky, together with the length & direction of the shadows it casts.

name: Amazon Rekognition
description: Check how similar two faces are

name: Azure AI Video Indexer
description: AI video tool for facial detection and other types of insights.

name: FaceCheck.ID
description: A facial recognition search engine that tries to find photos of people that look similar to a person of interest.

name: GFPGAN
description: Practical face restoration algorithm for *old photos* or *AI-generated faces*

name: PimEyes
description: An AI-powered facial recognition reverse image search tool.

name: Search4Faces
description: Upload a facepic, find similar on VKontakte, Odnoklassniki, TikTok, Clubhouse)

name: VFF
description: VGG Face Finder (VFF) Engine  Visual Geometry Group and released under the BSD-2 clause. VFF is a web application that serves as a web engine to perform searches for faces over an user-defined image dataset. It is based on the original application created by VGG to perform visual searchers over a large dataset of images from BBC News.

name: AmIReal
description: Github - GAN detector detects if faces were generated by ThisPersonDoesNotExist

name: AutoStitch
description: Autostitch is a free tool for seamlessly combining multiple photos into a single panoramic image, making it ideal for creating wide-angle photography without needing specialized equipment.

name: Cleanup.Pictures
description: Web tool for quickly removing objects from an image.

name: fdupes
description: Github - Locating exact matches of duplicate files.

name: Forensically
description: A collection of web-based image forensics tools. Can identify fake or doctored images.
